P2Trainer¶

module trainer.P2Trainer¶
class P2Trainer¶

The Precision-Level 2 (P2) Trainer class object instantiates a training session using PyTorch’s MaskRCNN-Benchmark for taking an input dataset and fasterrcnn model from PyTorch model zoo in order to generate a custom-trained P2 ONNX model file.

This model can then be deployed as a ROS2 package.

Public Functions

__init__(self, path_to_dataset, model_name, label_list)¶

The constructor.

Sets all the required fixed path to various files needed to start a training session.

Calls setNumClassesInTrainingConfig function.

setNumClassesInTrainingConfig(self)¶

A Mutator function that modifies the various training session config files.

train(self, debug)¶

A Mutator function that conducts a fixed 300-epoch training session to generate the custom-trained P2 ONNX model using bash scripts.

Calls createTrainFarm function.

Calls runTrainFarm function.

. Calls exportONNX function.

createTrainFarm(self, debug)¶

A Mutator function that runs a bash script that downloads and creates the necessary environment for a MaskRCNN-Benchmark training session.

runTrainFarm(self, debug)¶

A Mutator function that runs a bash script that utilizes the environment created in the createTrainFarm to run training session.

exportONNX(self, debug)¶

A Mutator function that runs a bash script that downloads, creates and runs an environment for exporting the trained .pth file to the final ONNX model file.
